mapper.select: SELECT IDX, FESTIVAL_IDX, ACCOUNT_ID, MONEY, TO_CHAR(DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAY, STATE, TO_CHAR(CANCEL_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CANCEL_DAY, TO_CHAR(PAY_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_DAY, PAY_TYPE FROM DONATION WHERE IDX = #{arg0} AND FESTIVAL_IDX = #{arg1}

SELECT IDX, FESTIVAL_IDX, ACCOUNT_ID, MONEY, TO_CHAR(DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAY, STATE, TO_CHAR(CANCEL_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CANCEL_DAY, TO_CHAR(PAY_DAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_DAY, PAY_TYPE FROM DONATION WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{arg0} AND FESTIVAL_IDX = #{arg1}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DONATION_COUNT FROM DONATION WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, BOARD.* FROM ( SELECT D.IDX, D.FESTIVAL_IDX, D.ACCOUNT_ID, D.MONEY, TO_CHAR(DAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS DAY, D.STATE, TO_CHAR(CANCEL_DAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS CANCEL_DAY, TO_CHAR(PAY_DAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS PAY_DAY, D.PAY_TYPE, F.SUBJECT, F.MAIN_IMG FROM DONATION D JOIN ( SELECT IDX, SUBJECT, MAIN_IMG FROM FESTIVAL ) F ON D.FESTIVAL_IDX = F.IDX WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ORDER BY D.IDX DESC ) BOARD ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}
